title: RAGDefender
description: A resource-efficient defense mechanism against knowledge corruption (i.e., by data poisoning) attacks in practical RAG deployments.

title: Korean Slang Detector
description: LLM-based Korean drug slang detection system that utilizes TF-IDF data augmentation and a context-aware attention model to achieve 98.16% accuracy.

title: iChat
description: A real-time chat application built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.io. Features include user authentication, private messaging, and a responsive UI.
